title: 15-year-old accidentally shoots self, in critical condition
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
A teen is in critical condition after accidentally shooting himself.
At 11:49 a.m. Sunday, officers responded to a shooting call in the 300 block of Gaston Avenue.
When they arrived, a man said he arrived at his home when he heard two gunshots inside.
The man’s son opened the door and said he shot himself.
The victim was taken to the hospital in critical condition.
The shooting is considered to be accidental.
